ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Magazine Looking to Interview Players
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The cute chick was Lt. Robin Lefler (Ashley Judd in her second appearance on ST:TNG-- previously in the episode Darmok she played Ensign Lefler) in the
ygData.messageBody:
> So its like that Star Trek episode where Wes and that
> cute chick resist the piece of headgear that zaps the
> crew's brain on every success?
>
The cute chick was Lt. Robin Lefler (Ashley Judd in her second appearance on
ST:TNG-- previously in the episode "Darmok" she played Ensign Lefler) in the
episdoe "The Game". The director of "Darmok" said in a scifi magazine way
back then that Ashley was going "to be a big star" someday.
Yes, I'm a Star Trek geek. I have a uniform, a phaser, rank pips,
comunicator with sound, and a tricorder. Oh, and I have a tribble. :-)
>
> If it was like that there'd be more subscribers I
> think.
>
Lol. True.
>
> Also, I don't know any *real* junkies who give up
> their horse for EQ horses :)
>
Well, my horse is a real jerk. He bit my leg and broke the skin just to
prove he's a jerk. So I'd take EQ over my horsie on some days. Would be cool
if there were horsies in game that look like him though.
>
> Some people have no lives, and if it wasn't EQ it'd be
> button collecting, beanie babies and crap. Just
> because they focus their neurotic behavior on EQ
> doesn't mean EQ caused their neurotic behavior.
>
Exactly! I was neurotically addicted to TV and internet before EQ. :-)
luv,
-Su
